thread.title: Turkey's lira hammered as Erdogan seeks more control

title: Turkey's lira hammered as Erdogan seeks more control
text:
Turkey's lira hammered as Erdogan seeks more control 1:32pm EDT - 01:32
Turkey's lira has slid to a record low and bond yields briefly touched their highest in at least eight years, after President Tayyip Erdogan said he plans to take greater control of the economy after elections next month. Lea Jakobiak reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Turkey's lira has slid to a record low and bond yields briefly touched their highest in at least eight years, after President Tayyip Erdogan said he plans to take greater control of the economy after elections next month.
